original_text: The length of one curtain was twenty and eight cubits, and the breadth of one curtain four cubits: the curtains were all of one size.
korean_text: 매 폭의 길이는 스물여덟 규빗, 너비는 네 규빗으로 각 폭의 장단을 같게 하여

sentences.original_text: The length of one curtain was twenty and eight cubits
and the breadth of one curtain four cubits
The curtains were all of one size
